entities.name: SYSTRAN SAS
entities.description: A company that has an IT Charter governing the use of electronic messaging and IT security policies for its personnel.

entities.name: Professional Email Messaging
entities.description: Digital messaging service provided by SYSTRAN for professional communication with third parties and internal use, subject to specific policies regarding content, unsolicited messages, and personal use.

entities.name: Anti-spam Tool
entities.description: A tool utilized by SYSTRAN to combat the propagation of unsolicited messages (spam) within its network.

entities.name: Antiviral Control
entities.description: Technology implemented to scan and control digital messages for viruses, applied to professional email messaging.

entities.name: Anti-spam Control
entities.description: Technology implemented to scan and control digital messages for spam, applied to professional email messaging.
The maximum size for email attachments to prevent congestion of the messaging system.
The issuance or update of SYSTRAN's IT Charter, version 11, outlining IT usage policies.

entities.name: Service IT
entities.description: The internal IT department of SYSTRAN, responsible for monitoring and supporting the security devices and addressing dysfunctions.
